::: {.question} **Cumulative Abnormal Return (CAR) Around News** A firm-specific news generates an **event-day abnormal return = 0.78%**, followed by **3 days** with an **average abnormal return of -0.01% per day**. ::: {.question-block}
✅ CAR logic (in %): Sum abnormal returns over the window.
CAR = AR0 + ∑t>0 ARt = 0.78% + 3 × -0.01% = 0.75%.

Interpretation: Under semi-strong EMH, prices should adjust quickly to news. A post-event drift (positive or negative) may indicate delayed reaction or under/overreaction.
::: :::
